# zeus_pool (Data Source)

Lookup a Zeus pool by ID

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "zeus" {
  endpoint = "http://localhost:8080"
  token    = "changeme"
}

data "zeus_pool" "example" {
  id = "pool-id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Pool ID

### Read-Only

- `begin` (String)
- `end` (String)
- `friendly_name` (String)
- `gateway_ip` (String)
- `region` (String)
- `size` (Number)
- `state` (List of Number)
